about.title: Why Choose Us
about.intro: Because we offer MEZE made by hand — with craftsmanship, passion, and meat from Bulgarian pigs. An authentic aroma that fills the table, a rich taste that awakens the senses. Our meze is simply the best because it’s:

keycards.title: Made from Fresh Meat
keycards.text: Fresh Bulgarian meat only from verified sources. Vacuum-sealed right after drying for maximum freshness.

keycards.title: No Additives
keycards.text: No preservatives, antioxidants, colorants, stabilizers, sweeteners, or anything artificial. Only spices.

keycards.title: High in Protein
keycards.text: At least 45g of protein per 100g of meze and only 4g of fat. 217 kcal per 100g — perfect for fueling your body after a workout.

keycards.title: Tender and Juicy
keycards.text: Our meze is carefully dried to achieve a tender texture — not hard or chewy — so everyone can enjoy it.

keycards.title: A Flavor for Everyone
keycards.text: We constantly experiment with new spices and flavors. Our goal is to offer a meze for every taste.

about.footer: This is just the beginning — every bite is a taste of Bulgaria.

hexa.title: Craftsmanship
text: We believe in making our delicacies so tasty that they simply can’t be resisted.
Each fillet is hand-prepared with care, using Bulgarian meat and authentic local spices, perfectly fused together.
The result — a product that carries the soul of Bulgarian taste, created with patience and pride.

1.text: From farm to table — always fresh, always real. We never compromise freshness because it defines our quality.

2.text: Inspired by Bulgarian tradition, we keep alive the old recipes that once filled every home with warmth and flavor.

paragraph.1: We are people who love tradition. People who believe that good food is not just about taste — it’s a memory, an emotion, a connection to something deeper.
paragraph.2: It all started with disappointment — yet another “mezze” that looked good but had no soul. And then we said to ourselves: enough. If we want something real, we’ll make it ourselves. From the heart, the way it used to be made. No compromises.
paragraph.3: For three years now, we’ve been making quality Bulgarian delicacies — no additives, no chemicals, no unnecessary talk. Just real meat, natural spices, and old Bulgarian craftsmanship. Our ancestors used to say: the meat must be Bulgarian, fresh, juicy. Not raised, but grazed. Not picked, but plucked.
paragraph.4: Our fillet is tender – it melts in your mouth and tempts the senses. Each of our products is made with care for taste and detail. We offer a variety of flavors for every taste and occasion: from classic, through spicy, to more exotic combinations for those who love to experiment.
paragraph.5: We are not a big factory. We are people who love what they do. And if you also like to pour yourself a drink and put a fine mezze next to it — then you’ve come to the right place.

text.normal: Contact us - and discover how much you've lost…

1.question: How can I get in touch with your company?
1.answer: You can reach us by phone or by email.

2.question: Do you deliver?
2.answer: Yes, we deliver to most of Bulgaria via Econt and Speedy.

3.question: What kind of meat do you use?
3.answer: Fresh Bulgarian meat, raised in Bulgarian farms.

4.question: How should I store my meat?
4.answer: It has a long shelf life in the refrigerator. At least half a year, but we seriously doubt you'll ressist the temptation.

5.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
5.answer: Depends on the ammount of meat you order. We don't offer discounts for small orders.

6.question: Why is there a limit of 5kg per order?
6.answer: Our production capacity is limited at the current time. The limit is to ensure everyone can taste our meats.

7.question: How long does it take to prepare the order?
7.answer: 14 days on average. And a day or two for delivery.
